summary: Can spawn Ancient, Blood, Elder, Frost, Normal Dragons.
descriptionHtml:
Place these in you Main Skyrim Directory (The one that contains TESV.exe and Skyrim Launcher) 
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim -Default for Steam.

Ingame hit the Tilde Key (~) and type the following... (In order of difficulty to kill, with Ancient being the hardest)

\"bat ancdrag\" (Without Quotes) to spawn an Ancient Dragon
\"bat blooddrag\" (Without Quotes) to spawn a Blood Dragon
\"bat Elddrag\" (Without Quotes) to spawn an Elder Dragon
\"bat frostdrag\" (Without Quotes) to spawn an Frost Dragon
\"bat normdrag\" (Without Quotes) to spawn a boring regular Dragon


More Creature Spawn Codes to Come (Finding the ID\'s can be long and hard work)



Future Mods From Me:
Daedric Dagger Re-Textured (Maybe even re-meshed, probably not though) as a Dragon Bone Dagger.

Dragon Plate Re-Textured as Marble
author: TheGreatGriff
